body:
`basic_usage.rst` claims:

```
Modules may be loaded recursively with the ``load`` command's
``--dependencies`` or ``-r`` argument:

.. code-block:: sh

    $ spack load --dependencies <spec> ...
```

This is incorrect.  `spack module loads` has the recursive feature, but not `spack load`.  We should upgrade `spack load` with this feature.
title: Fix `spack load --dependencies`
